title: Krak Minute – Los Alamos Park, Fountain Valley
content:
Consider the following skateboarding’s roll of honor:

Ed Templeton – Feeble – Sheep ‘Life of Leisure’
Jason Dill – Fs crook – 411vm#30
Stefan Attardo – Fs nosegrind shuvit & fs 180 nosegrind – Team BK ‘A New Horizon’
Joey Pulsifer – Fs lipslide 270 – Team BK ‘A New Horizon’
Ronnie Creager – Fs tailslide 270 & tailslide flip out – Rodney Mullen VS Daewon Song Round 2
James Craig – Fs tail heelflip out – Rodney Mullen VS Daewon Song Round 2
Brad Hayes – Fs blunt to fakie – Team BK ‘A New Horizon’
Arto Saari – Blunt & halfcab crook revers – TWS ‘Feedback’
Corey Shepard – Flip bs tail & fakie nosegrind revers – Rodney Mullen VS Daewon Song Round 2
Brad Hayes – Fakie crook – Team BK ‘A New Horizon’
Robert Lim – Nollie halfcab crook & nollie halfcab crook revers – Team BK ‘A New Horizon’
Danny Montoya – Nollie noseblunt – 411vm Best of #6
Mark Baines – Nollie halfcab heel manny – Team BK ‘A New Horizon’
Chet Thomas – Flip up + nollie half cab crook – Rodney Mullen VS Daewon Song Round 2
author: simon
